alert.note: Alert for Logan; Morgan; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 5:07PM MDT until June 21 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Weld County in northeastern Colorado... Northeastern Morgan County in northeastern Colorado... Southwestern Logan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 507 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Antelope Springs, or 16 miles north of Fort Morgan, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Stoneham. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for northeastern Colorado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for northeastern Colorado.
